mapper.select: SELECT no, subject, name, regdate, hit, rcount, num FROM (SELECT no, subject, name, regdate, hit, rcount, rownum as num FROM (SELECT no, subject, name, regdate, hit, rcount FROM replyboard ORDER BY no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO replyBoard VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(no)+1, 1) FROM replyBoard), #{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{pwd}, SYSDATE, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE replyBoard SET name=#{name}, subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE no=#{no}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(no)+1, 1) FROM reply), #{bno}, #{id}, #{name}, #{msg}, SYSDATE)
